Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Consolidate to monorepo: absorb shub app into shub-project

- Remove broken gitlink/submodule for shub/ subdirectory
- Add all application source files directly to shub-project repo
- Add root .gitignore \(excludes .env, node_modules, dist, .bolt, 
  supabase/.temp, PDFs, OS artifacts, integration workspace\)
- Add Docker development environment \(docker-compose.yml, Dockerfile\)
- Add dev-scripts.bat and README-Docker.md
- Include all 60+ source files previously staged but uncommitted in
  inner shub repo \(booking system, messaging, moderation, safety,
  verification, reporting components, hooks, and services\)
- Include 13 Supabase migrations covering schema setup through
  Phase 2 bookings alignment
- Clean up nul artifact files

The inner shub repo \(Mturnernz/shub\) remains on GitHub as historical
reference. This repo \(shub-project\) is now the single source of truth.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 0: Architectural foundation for production Shub platform

Restructure from bolt.new prototype to the production architecture
prescribed by the foundational research document.

Architecture changes:
- Feature-based "Screaming Architecture" folder structure
  \(features/auth, features/listings, features/bookings,
   features/messages, features/profiles, features/safety,
   features/verification, features/admin\)
- React Router v7 with lazy-loaded routes \(replaces 486-line
  state-driven App.tsx with 15-line router setup\)
- Zustand stores for auth and UI state \(replaces prop drilling\)
- TanStack Query client configured \(5min stale, 30min gc\)
- New AppShell layout with URL-based bottom navigation

Design system:
- Tailwind semantic color tokens: trust \(blue #0066CC\),
  safe \(green #10B981\), warm \(coral #FF6B4A\)
- Surface and text tokens ready for dark mode
- Replaces purple/pink palette with trust-first blue/green

Testing:
- Vitest + React Testing Library + jest-dom configured
- 43 content moderation tests passing \(safety-critical code\)
- Coverage targeting business logic in features/safety/

PWA foundation:
- Web app manifest with theme_color #0066CC
- Meta tags for installability and mobile optimization
- Service worker placeholder ready for Phase 5

Database:
- Schema alignment migration adding soft deletes \(deleted_at\),
  JSONB metadata fields, reviews table with category ratings,
  favorites table, and updated RLS policies

Build: vite build passes \(1660 modules, 0 errors\)
Tests: vitest run passes \(43/43\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
